name: Monkey.D.Garp
text: On Play: You may place 3 cards with the (Navy) type from your trash to the bottom of your deck in any order. Give up to 1 of your Leaders 1 rested DON!! card. Then, if there is a Character in play with a cost of 9 or more, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's characters with a cost of 7 or less.

effect.text: You may place 3 cards with the (Navy) type from your trash to the bottom of your deck in any order. Give up to 1 of your Leaders 1 rested DON!! card. Then, if there is a Character in play with a cost of 9 or more, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's characters with a cost of 7 or less.
